page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {Here are some kinds of entertainment { in 1985. There are lots of different kinds of entertainment for children nowadays. Breakdancing is the new way of dancing,some of the moves are backspin,swallowdive,catterpiller, headspin and donkeykicks.A team of breakers is often called a crew.Crews often compete against each other.This is called battle films. In the cinemas you can see films such as"Herbie Goes Bananas".This is all about a crazy car which has a mind of its own.It bumps into a water pump and bananas start flying about everywhere and lots more exciting things happen. Or you could go and see a play.Peter Pan is a young man.He lives in Never Land with seven boys.One day he takes 3 children to Never Land.This is where children never grow up.
